item.question:
overweening
[ˌoʊvərˈwiːnɪŋ]
item.answer:
【考法】 adj. 傲慢的，专横的：having a feeling of superiority that shows itself in an overbearing attitude
【例】 His modesty is just a masquerade for his overweening conceit.他的谦虚只不过是掩盖其傲慢本质的面具。
【近】 assumptive, arrogant, bumptious, haughty, imperious, peremptory, pompous, presuming, presumptuous, pretentious, supercilious
【反】 humble, modest 谦逊的
